title: Tortoise
description: Sit with your legs stretched in front of you. Open your feet two to three feet wide. Bend your knees. Bend forward with an exhale and thread your shoulders under your knees. Stretch your hands to the sides. Lower your head. Straighten your legs to flatten your chest to the floor with an exhale. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Release your arms and rise with an inhale. Press legs against upper arms Push heels down and forward Modification: Keep your knees bent and point your hands forward.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
